articles.description: This well-proven stock of a long-established company is far too easy to overlook, which would be a mistake.
articles.content: You might be a regular customer of Coca-Cola (KO 0.26%), but are you a shareholder as well? If so, you know at least one of the several reasons to own it. If not, here's a rundown of the top four rea… [+3810 chars]
